author: Stephanie Bedard-Chateauneuf
title: U.S. Consumer Confidence Is Plunging – But More Pain Is Coming
description: U.S. consumer confidence plunged less than expected in March, but we should't be too optimistic as economic pain is far from over. The post U.S. Consumer Confidence Is Plunging – But More Pain Is Coming appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• The Conference Boards gauge of U.S. consumer confidence plunged from 132.6 to 120 in March, while economists expected a 110 number.
  • Confidence is likely to decline further in the coming months.
  • It will probably take a long time before … [+3698 chars]
